Title: We’re Going to Make $600,000 but Take Home Nothing
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • A chef wondering why his business doesn't make any profit  
  • Dave Ramsey reacting to Canada’s absurd capital gains tax on the sale of a business 
  • How creating a successful business requires more than products  
  • A former business owner looking to establish a healthy culture in a new role
